italic.text: To improve natural or man made obstacles.

line.text: In Sword, to improve a set of sword objects with mines. An improved object (an engineer obstacle for instance) is harder to remove because agents of the simulation need to remove mines before decontructing the object. Remove mines improvement takes delays.

The commander agent issues the "Improve (with mines)" mission to the engineer platoons, with a set of obstacles as parameter. Obstacles are fairly shared between engineer platoons.
Other units are ordered to follow engineer units (if the number of engineer platoons is greater than the number of obstacles, non used platoons are ordered to reach the meeting position).
When all obstacles have been improved, the engineer units move to the meeting position and the mission terminates.
The mission terminates when all subordinates has finished their mission.
